nodes.text: A B1 battle droid was stationed on the bridge of a Munificent-class star frigate in 22 BBY.

During the space ambush over Rugosa, the B1-Series battle droid was ordered by a OOM command battle droid to shoot down Jedi Master Yoda's Consular-class cruiser and, later, the escape pods released from it. The droid made an effort to shoot Yoda's pod down, but was unable to do so and was scolded by the command droid.
